price: Ka sε: ‘’Nyankopͻn na nyinasoͻ pefee a εkͻ aso mu no wͻ no. Sε Ɔpε a anka ͻbεkyerε mo nyinaa kwan (tenenee no).
arabic: قُلۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحُجَّةُ ٱلۡبَٰلِغَةُۖ فَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul falillahi al-ḥujatu al-bālighatu falaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
